ernest
Interface IObservation

All Known Implementing Classes:
Observation
public interface IObservation

The main construct that represents Ernest's current observation of its situation.

Author:
Olivier

getDynamicFeature

java.lang.String getDynamicFeature()
Returns:
This observation's dynamic feature: reflect the changes in the salience of attention over the last interaction cycle.

setFrontBundle

void setFrontBundle(IBundle bundle)

anticipate

void anticipate(IObservation previousObservation,
                IAct act)
Initialize this observation by anticipating the consequences of the intended act on the previous observation. Does not predict the square in front (leave it unchanged). TODO Anticipation should be refined using visual information.

Parameters:
previousObservation - The previous observation on which we construct the anticipated observation.
act - The intention act.

setConfirmation

void setConfirmation(boolean confirmation)
Parameters:
confirmation - True If and only if the adjusted observation matches the anticipated observation (the criteria used to evaluate whether there is a match need to be define by the modeler)

getConfirmation

boolean getConfirmation()
Returns:
true if the anticipation was confirmed, false if the anticipation was incorrect

setSalience

void setSalience(ISalience salience)
Parameters:
salience - The salience of current attention

setTactileMap

void setTactileMap()
Test if Ernest touches a fish Creates a gray bundle in the peripersonal map if Ernest touches a fish (no more than one gray bundle)

getTactileStimulation

IStimulation getTactileStimulation(int x,
                                   int y)
Get a stimulation in the tactile map

Parameters:
x - X coordinate in the tactile map (left to right)
y - Y coordinate in the tactile map (top to bottom)
Returns:
the tactile stimulation perceived in the tactile map

getTactileSalience

ISalience getTactileSalience()
Check from salient tactile features in Ernest's tactile map.

Returns:
the possible tactile salience that indicates a wall in front of Ernest. Null if no wall in front of Ernest.
